description: Combat stat sources guide - all the hidden multipliers that determine who wins battles

core_insight.title: Why You Lost With Similar Troops
core_insight.explanation: Two players with identical hero levels and troop counts can have WILDLY different combat results. The difference is in the 'hidden multipliers' - stats from Research, Daybreak Island, Chief Gear, Charms, Pets, and Alliance Tech that compound in the background.
core_insight.key_formula: Damage = sqrt(Troops) × (Attack × Lethality) / (Enemy Defense × Enemy Health) × SkillModifier
core_insight.implication: Attack and Lethality MULTIPLY together. A 10% boost to each = 21% more damage. These stats come from places most players neglect.

research_battle_tree.name: Research - Battle Tree
priority_order: 1. Lethality (your main troop type) - BIGGEST damage multiplier
2. Attack (your main troop type) - Base damage increase
3. Defense (your main troop type) - Reduces losses
4. Regimental Expansion - More troops = more damage
5. Other troop types
research_battle_tree.common_mistake: Researching Growth/Economy tree while ignoring Battle tree after Tool Enhancement VII
research_battle_tree.quick_check: Have you researched Tier 4+ in your main troop type's Lethality?

daybreak_island.name: Daybreak Island - Battle Enhancer Decorations
daybreak_island.overview: Combat stats come from DECORATIONS you place on the island, not just Tree of Life progression.

mythic_decorations.description: These are the BIG combat stat sources - 10% bonuses at max level each

epic_decorations.description: 2.5% bonuses at max - stepping stones to Mythic

limited_mythic.Serpent Sanctuary: +20% ALL four combat stats (Attack, Defense, Health, Lethality)

max_potential.per_troop_type: +10% Attack, +10% Defense from Mythic decorations alone
max_potential.with_limited_mythic: Even higher with Serpent Sanctuary (+20% all stats)

priority_order: 1. Build Mythic decorations for your MAIN troop type first
2. Get both Attack AND Defense Mythic for main type (+20% combined)
3. Tree of Life to L10 for universal buffs
4. Epic decorations as stepping stones while building Mythic
daybreak_island.common_mistake: Players ignore Daybreak decorations or build random ones for aesthetics. Someone with maxed Floating Market + Snow Castle has +20% Infantry stats you don't.
daybreak_island.quick_check: Do you have Mythic decorations for your main troop type? Are they leveled up?

chief_gear.name: Chief Gear
priority_order: 1. Ring - Universal attack boost, affects everything
2. Amulet - Lethality multiplier, huge damage impact
3. Gloves/Boots - Attack for your main troop type
4. Helmet/Armor - Defensive stats
chief_gear.quality_goal: Mythic Ring and Amulet should be top priority
chief_gear.common_mistake: Upgrading Helmet/Armor first because 'infantry tanks need defense'. Wrong - damage wins fights, not tanking.
chief_gear.quick_check: Are your Ring and Amulet at Legendary or Mythic quality?

chief_charms.name: Chief Charms
priority_order: 1. Upgrade evenly for army-wide bonus
2. Focus on your main troop type's charms
3. Target Level 11 on priority charms before spreading
chief_charms.uniformity_bonus: Evenly upgrading all charms grants an ARMY-WIDE attack/defense boost on top of individual bonuses
chief_charms.common_mistake: Ignoring charms because the UI is confusing and materials seem scarce. Each charm level adds combat stats.
chief_charms.quick_check: Are all your charms at Level 5+? Is your main troop type at Level 8+?

pets.name: Pet Combat Skills
priority_order: 1. Saber-tooth Tiger for attack (Lethality +10%)
2. Mammoth for defense (+10% defense)
3. Frost Gorilla for health (+10% health)
4. Cave Lion for attack (+10% attack)
pets.common_mistake: Not activating combat pets before SvS/battles. Also not leveling combat pets - a L50 pet gives much smaller buff than L100.
pets.quick_check: Do you own Saber-tooth Tiger or Mammoth? Are they leveled to 50+?

alliance_tech.name: Alliance Technology

stats_provided.troop_attack: Percentage boost to all troop attack
stats_provided.troop_defense: Percentage boost to all troop defense
stats_provided.troop_health: Percentage boost to all troop health

alliance_tech.you_cant_control: This is alliance-wide. Strong alliances have better tech.
what_you_can_do: Join an active alliance that prioritizes combat tech
Check alliance tech levels before joining
alliance_tech.common_mistake: Joining a dead alliance for 'peace' and missing out on tech bonuses.
alliance_tech.quick_check: Is your alliance actively researching combat tech? Do they have Troop Attack/Defense researched?

vip_level.name: VIP Level
vip_level.indirect_combat_value: Higher VIP = faster research/training = faster stat gains
vip_level.common_mistake: None really - most players understand VIP.

hero_expedition_skills.name: Hero Expedition Skills

critical_understanding.rally_joining: ONLY the leftmost hero's expedition skill (top-right skill) applies

best_joiner_skills.why: Best rally joiner skill in game

hero_expedition_skills.common_mistake: Using wrong hero in leftmost slot when joining rallies. Their expedition skill is wasted.
hero_expedition_skills.quick_check: Do you put Jessie or Jeronimo in leftmost slot when joining rallies?

troop_tier.name: Troop Tier
troop_tier.key_insight: Higher tier troops have better BASE attack/defense/health. All percentage bonuses multiply off this base.
troop_tier.common_mistake: Having millions of T6-T7 troops instead of promoting to T9-T10.
troop_tier.quick_check: Are your main combat troops T9 or T10?

quick_audit_checklist.description: High-impact items to check. If you answer 'No' to these, you've found a weakness.

milestones.question: Have you completed Tool Enhancement VII?
milestones.why: 35% faster research on everything. Must be done first.

milestones.question: Have you researched Tier 4+ Lethality for your main troop type?
milestones.why: Lethality is a damage MULTIPLIER. This is often the difference in close fights.

milestones.question: Do you have a Mythic Attack decoration for your main troop type (Floating Market/Amphitheatre/Observation Deck)?
milestones.why: +10% Attack for your troop type. This is a massive damage boost most players skip.

milestones.question: Do you have a Mythic Defense decoration for your main troop type (Snow Castle/Elegant Villa/Art Gallery)?
milestones.why: +10% Defense for your troop type. Combined with Attack decoration = +20% stats.

milestones.question: Are your Mythic battle decorations upgraded to high levels?
milestones.why: Mythic decorations scale to +10% at max level. Unleveled ones give much less.

milestones.question: Have you reached Tree of Life Level 10?
milestones.why: +5% Attack, +5% Defense, +5% Health, +5% Lethality - universal bonuses for all troops.

milestones.question: Are your Chief Ring and Amulet at Legendary or Mythic?
milestones.why: Ring (Attack) and Amulet (Lethality) affect ALL troops in ALL battles.

milestones.question: Are all your Chief Charms at Level 5+?
milestones.why: Each charm level adds combat stats. Even upgrades unlock army-wide bonus.

milestones.question: Are your main troop type's Charms at Level 8+?
milestones.why: Focused investment in your primary class pays off in every fight.

milestones.question: Do you own a combat pet (Saber-tooth, Mammoth, Frost Gorilla)?
milestones.why: +10% stat buffs for 2 hours. Activate before every major battle.

milestones.question: Is your combat pet at Level 50+?
milestones.why: Higher level = bigger buff. L100 pet gives ~2x the buff of L50.

milestones.question: Do you use Jessie/Jeronimo in leftmost slot when joining rallies?
milestones.why: Only leftmost hero's expedition skill applies. Wrong hero = wasted slot.

milestones.question: Are your main combat troops T9 or T10?
milestones.why: Higher tier = higher base stats. All % bonuses multiply off this base.

milestones.question: Is your alliance actively researching combat tech?
milestones.why: Alliance tech provides permanent stat boosts while you're a member.

common_blind_spots.description: Things most players skip that cost them battles

blind_spots.name: Battle Research Lethality
blind_spots.explanation: Most players research Attack before Lethality. But Lethality is a MULTIPLIER on Attack. If you have high Attack but low Lethality, you're leaving damage on the table.
blind_spots.fix: Prioritize Lethality research for your main troop type. It's often buried in the Battle tree.

blind_spots.name: Daybreak Island Battle Decorations
blind_spots.explanation: Daybreak seems like a cosmetic minigame. Most players build random decorations or ignore it. But Mythic battle decorations (Floating Market, Snow Castle, Amphitheatre, etc.) give +10% Attack or Defense PER DECORATION for your troop type. An opponent with both Attack + Defense Mythics has +20% stats you don't have.
blind_spots.fix: Build Mythic decorations for your MAIN troop type: Infantry (Floating Market + Snow Castle), Lancer (Amphitheatre + Elegant Villa), Marksman (Observation Deck + Art Gallery). Level them up for full +10% each.

blind_spots.name: Chief Charms
blind_spots.explanation: The Charm UI is confusing and materials are scattered. Most players upgrade randomly or ignore them.
blind_spots.fix: Upgrade all charms evenly for army-wide bonus, then focus on your main troop type.

blind_spots.name: Amulet Priority
blind_spots.explanation: Many players upgrade Helmet/Armor first because infantry 'needs defense'. But damage wins fights - dead enemies deal no damage.

blind_spots.name: Pet Buff Activation
blind_spots.explanation: Combat pets give +10% buffs but only for 2 hours. Players forget to activate before battles.
blind_spots.fix: Always activate Saber-tooth Tiger (Lethality) or Mammoth (Defense) before SvS/major fights.

blind_spots.name: Alliance Tech
blind_spots.explanation: Players join weak/dead alliances for 'peace' and miss out on tech bonuses that strong alliances have.
blind_spots.fix: Check alliance tech levels before joining. An active alliance's tech gives permanent stat boosts.

blind_spots.name: Rally Joiner Hero Slot
blind_spots.explanation: When joining rallies, ONLY the leftmost hero's expedition skill applies. Using the wrong hero wastes a skill slot.
blind_spots.fix: Always put Jessie (best) or Jeronimo in leftmost slot when joining rallies.
